00030 #define HT_PROPERTIES_ABBR_ACCESSORS \
00031   inline bool get_bool(const String &name) { return get<bool>(name); } \
00032   inline String get_str(const String &name) { return get<String>(name); } \
00033   inline uint16_t get_i16(const String &name) { return get<uint16_t>(name); } \
00034   inline int32_t get_i32(const String &name) { return get<int32_t>(name); } \
00035   inline int64_t get_i64(const String &name) { return get<int64_t>(name); } \
00036   inline bool get_bool(const String &name, bool default_value) { \
00037     return get(name, default_value); \
00038   } \
00039   inline String get_str(const String &name, const String &default_value) { \
00040     return get(name, default_value); \
00041   } \
00042   inline uint16_t get_i16(const String &name, uint16_t default_value) { \
00043     return get(name, default_value); \
00044   } \
00045   inline int32_t get_i32(const String &name, int32_t default_value) { \
00046     return get(name, default_value); \
00047   } \
00048   inline int64_t get_i64(const String &name, int64_t default_value) { \
00049     return get(name, default_value); \
00050   }

00058 const uint64_t K = 1000;
00059 const uint64_t KiB = 1024;
00060 const uint64_t M = K * 1000;
00061 const uint64_t MiB = KiB * 1024;
00062 const uint64_t G = M * 1000;
00063 const uint64_t GiB = MiB * 1024;
00064 
00065 // Abbrs for some common types
00066 inline Po::typed_value<bool> *boo() { return Po::value<bool>(); }
00067 inline Po::typed_value<String> *str() { return Po::value<String>(); }
00068 inline Po::typed_value<uint16_t> *i16() { return Po::value<uint16_t>(); }
00069 inline Po::typed_value<int32_t> *i32() { return Po::value<int32_t>(); }
00070 inline Po::typed_value<int64_t> *i64() { return Po::value<int64_t>(); }

00074 typedef Po::options_description PropertiesDesc;
00075 typedef Po::positional_options_description PositionalDesc;

00077 class Properties : public ReferenceCount {
00078   typedef Po::variable_value Value;
00079   typedef Po::variables_map Map;
00080   typedef std::map<String, String> AliasMap;
00081 
00082 public:
00083   Properties() : m_need_alias_sync(false) {}
00084 
00092   void load(const String &filename, const PropertiesDesc &desc,
00093             bool allow_unregistered = false);
00094 
00104   void
00105   parse_args(int argc, char *argv[], const PropertiesDesc &desc,
00106              const PropertiesDesc *hidden = 0, const PositionalDesc *p = 0);
00107 
00111   void
00112   parse_args(const std::vector<String> &args, const PropertiesDesc &desc,
00113              const PropertiesDesc *hidden = 0, const PositionalDesc *p = 0);
00114 
00120   template <typename T>
00121   T get(const String &name) const {
00122     try { return m_map[name].template as<T>(); }
00123     catch (std::exception &e) {
00124       HT_THROWF(Error::CONFIG_GET_ERROR, "getting value of %s: %s",
00125                 name.c_str(), e.what());
00126     }
00127   }
00128 
00138   template <typename T>
00139   T get(const String &name, const T &default_value) const {
00140     try {
00141       Map::const_iterator it = m_map.find(name);
00142 
00143       if (it != m_map.end())
00144         return (*it).second.template as<T>();
00145 
00146       return default_value;
00147     }
00148     catch (std::exception &e) {
00149       HT_THROWF(Error::CONFIG_GET_ERROR, "getting value of %s: %s",
00150                 name.c_str(), e.what());
00151     }
00152   }
00153 
00160   bool defaulted(const String &name) const {
00161     return m_map[name].defaulted();
00162   }
00163 
00164   bool has(const String &name) const { return m_map.count(name); }
00165 
00166   HT_PROPERTIES_ABBR_ACCESSORS
00167 
00175   std::pair<Map::iterator, bool>
00176   add(const String &name, const boost::any &v, bool defaulted = false) {
00177     m_need_alias_sync = true;
00178     return m_map.insert(Map::value_type(name, Value(v, defaulted)));
00179   }
00180 
00188   void set(const String &name, const boost::any &v, bool defaulted = false) {
00189     std::pair<Map::iterator, bool> r = add(name, v, defaulted);
00190 
00191     if (!r.second)
00192       (*r.first).second = Value(v, defaulted);
00193   }
00194 
00203   void alias(const String &primary, const String &secondary,
00204              bool overwrite = false);
00205 
00211   void sync_aliases();
00212 
00219   void print(std::ostream &out, bool include_default = false);
00220 
00224   static String to_str(const boost::any &);
00225 
00226 private:
00227   bool m_need_alias_sync;
00228   Map m_map;
00229   AliasMap m_alias_map;
00230 };

00232 typedef intrusive_ptr<Properties> PropertiesPtr;
00233 
00237 class SubProperties {
00238 public:
00239   SubProperties(PropertiesPtr &props, const String &prefix)
00240     : m_props(props), m_prefix(prefix) { }
00241 
00242   String full_name(const String &name) const { return m_prefix + name; }
00243 
00244   template <typename T>
00245   T get(const String &name) const {
00246     return m_props->get<T>(full_name(name));
00247   }
00248 
00249   template <typename T>
00250   T get(const String &name, const T &default_value) const {
00251     return m_props->get(full_name(name), default_value);
00252   }
00253 
00254   bool defaulted(const String &name) const {
00255     return m_props->defaulted(full_name(name));
00256   }
00257 
00258   bool has(const String &name) const {
00259     return m_props->has(full_name(name));
00260   }
00261 
00262   HT_PROPERTIES_ABBR_ACCESSORS
00263 
00264 private:
00265   PropertiesPtr m_props;
00266   String m_prefix;
00267 };
